name: Italian Theatre and Performance
description: (Offered in English) A study of Italian dramas (comedy, tragedy, opera) from the Nineteenth and Twentieth Centuries with a consideration of staging and acting techniques mainly through the production of a specific play or operatic piece. [24L, 48P, 24T].
prerequisites: ITA200Y5/201Y5 or permission of the department. Prerequisite only applicable to students enrolled in an Italian Minor, Major or Specialist program.
